name: The Speccies
overview: Guide your Speccie onto their respective coloured pads to complete each level. Once you start a Speccie rolling, it won't stop until it hits a wall, a lock, a shrub or even another Speccie. Same colour items only affect the same colour Speccie. Collect hearts to increase your lives and jokers to prevent you losing a life when you roll over a bomb of the same colour. Rolling over a clock will increase the time limit you have to complete the level. There are 101 levels to complete... let's roll!
